elements.title: a statue commemorating her
elements.contents: ... that an eleven-year-old sentenced to three weeks' hard labour for stealing a loaf of bread has a statue commemorating her (pictured)?

elements.title: Anno 117
elements.contents: ... that Anno 117 received around €5.7 million from the federal government of Germany, its largest grant for a single video-game project to date?

elements.title: 2001 QW322
elements.contents: ... that astronomers discovered the wide binary system 2001 QW322 while searching for new moons of Uranus?

elements.title: Virginia voters are scheduled to decide in 2026
elements.contents: ... that Virginia voters are scheduled to decide in 2026 whether to formally legalize same-sex marriage?

elements.title: Joan Russell
elements.contents: ... that Joan Russell's drawings of Canterbury may form the most complete record of World War II bomb damage to any British city outside London?

elements.title: Avtar Singh Sohal
elements.contents: ... that Avtar Singh Sohal and Surjeet Singh Panesar played for the Kenya field hockey team in four editions of the Olympics?

elements.title: Semele
elements.contents: ... that Aeschylus's lost play Semele is the only known example of the goddess Hera appearing on stage in ancient Greek tragedy?

elements.title: TKO
elements.contents: ... that Justin Timberlake uses boxing metaphors in "TKO" to describe the feeling of seeing a former lover with someone else?

elements.title: Tibet's first king
elements.contents: ... that one account of Tibet's first king said that he had webbed hands and eyelids that closed upward?
